name: Paracetamol
notes: Take after food. Do not exceed 4 tablets per day.

name: Vitamin D3
notes: Take once daily in the morning with breakfast.

name: Amoxicillin
notes: Take every 8 hours. Complete the course even if symptoms improve.

name: Cetirizine
notes: Take once at night to relieve allergies or cold symptoms.

name: Iron Supplement
notes: Take after lunch. Avoid taking with tea or coffee.
